title: Bontrager releases new premium Adventure frame, handlebar and seat bags
content:
Arriving alongside the updated Trek Checkpoint is a new venture for the folks at Bontrager — bags. Yes, Bontrager has produced bags in the past, but these are burly bike packing bags aimed at keeping your most precious gear dry and your mind at ease. Bontrager’s new aptly named Adventure Bags are the latest addition

The post Bontrager releases new premium Adventure frame, handlebar and seat bags appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
